Title: A SharePoint Client Object Model Demo in Silverlight
Description: This demo shows how to utilize the SharePoint 2010 Foundation's Client Object Model within a Silverlight application.
HomeWiki:

Adjustments via the SharePoint Designer and InfoPath. A flexible approach in our view offers the
Using Silverlight Controls, which easily via the standard Silverlight Web Part
can be integrated and hosted in SharePoint document libraries. In this article we show
the implementation of an individual form, which allows a non-existing values
Lookup when creating the elements in the consumer list to add dynamically without the
Entry form must be abandoned.

Authors:

Christian Hofmeister and Randy Mathes from Moving Targets Consulting GmbH (http://www.mtc-berlin.com)
